text: If a train travels 120 km in 2 hours, what is its speed?
A shopkeeper sells an item for Rs. 450 after giving 10% discount. What was the marked price?
If 20% of a number is 80, what is the number?
A can complete a work in 10 days. B can complete it in 15 days. Together, in how many days?
The average of 5 numbers is 20. If one number is excluded, average becomes 18. What is the excluded number?
